RESTRICTED for use in patients with:  - intolerance or poor response to oral iron supplements AND  - gastrointestinal malabsorption syndrome (for example inflammatory bowel disease, active celiac disease, atrophic gastritis) AND  - hemoglobin less than 110 g/L AND ONE OF:    -ferritin less than 30 mcg/L OR   -ferritin less than 200 mcg/L with iron saturation less than 20%  AND  - total dose required exceeds 300 mg IV iron elemental AND  - patients weighing at least 30 kg
